Repeat: k1 wrapping yarn 3 times around needle, k4
sl 1 wyib, drop yarn overs, k4

drop 1st Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, slip next 4 stitches wyib, drop 2nd Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, slip the same 4 stitches back to the left-hand needle, pick up 2nd dropped stitch and knit it; knit the 4 Color B stitches that were slipped before; then pick up the 1st dropped stitch and knit it; k4
k1 wrapping yarn 3 times around needle, k4
sl 1 wyib, drop yarn overs, k4

Begin Row: k1, sl 2 wyib, drop Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, slip the 2 slipped stitches back to left-hand needle, pick up dropped stitch and knit it; k6 *
Repeat: drop 1st Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, slip next 4 stitches wyib, drop 2nd Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, slip the same 4 stitches back to the left-hand needle, pick up 2nd dropped stitch and knit it; knit the 4 Color B stitches that were slipped before; then pick up the 1st dropped stitch and knit it; k4
End Row: drop Color A slip stitch off needle to front of work, k2, pick up dropped stitch and knit it, k1
